hero.title: About company
hero.subtitle: Over 25 years creating glass that transforms city skylines

story.title: Our story
story.p1: GlassTech was founded in 2001 with the goal of producing high-quality architectural glass for the Russian market.
story.p2: Starting with a small production facility, we gradually expanded, implementing the latest technologies and equipment.
story.p3: Today we are one of the leading glass product manufacturers in Russia, working with major construction and architectural companies.
story.p4: Our team of over 50 specialists possesses unique knowledge and experience, allowing us to implement the most complex and ambitious projects.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Production of world-class innovative glass products that make architecture safer, more energy-efficient and beautiful.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Become the leading manufacturer of architectural glass in Russia and CIS, setting new standards of quality and innovation.

values.title: Values
values.description: Quality, innovation, responsibility, professionalism and customer focus are the foundation of all our decisions.

petrov.description: 25 years of experience in glass industry
